actions.text: On agreeing to the Mascara amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 259 (Roll no. 55).

description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws relating to the enforcement of child support obligations.
purpose: An amendment exempting federal laws relating to the enforcement of child support enforcement from the provisions of the bill. The amendment was printed in the Congressional Record on January 19, 1995.
